list: [url=http://gaurav.munjal.us/Universal-LPC-Spritesheet-Character-Generator/Universal-LPC-spritesheet/AUTHORS.txt]Artists from the LPC Spritesheet Character Generator (Characters)[/url]
Luis Zuno, for [url=https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-town-pixel-art-assets]the City[/url] in the second scene
LPC Tile Atlas 2 for most things ([url=https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-tile-atlas2]see readme in zip file for attributions[/url])
